member.name: T:Messenger.FriendListManager.FriendList
member.summary: The class containing friend list functionality

summary.para: A live list of the currently-logged-in player's friends.
The list is empty if not logged in.

member.name: T:Messenger.FriendListManager.FriendListEntry
member.summary: An entry in a player's friend list.

member.name: F:Messenger.FriendListManager.FriendListEntry.ContentId
member.summary: The content ID of the friend.

member.name: F:Messenger.FriendListManager.FriendListEntry.CurrentWorld
member.summary: The current world of the friend.

member.name: F:Messenger.FriendListManager.FriendListEntry.HomeWorld
member.summary: The home world of the friend.

member.name: F:Messenger.FriendListManager.FriendListEntry.Job
member.summary: The job the friend is currently on.

member.name: F:Messenger.FriendListManager.FriendListEntry.RawName
member.summary: The friend's raw SeString name. See .

member.name: F:Messenger.FriendListManager.FriendListEntry.RawFreeCompany
member.summary: The friend's raw SeString free company tag. See .
